Room.Name: Crypt Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large cave in the crypt which splits off in all directions.
Room.LongDescription: The crypt does not look very big, but with the number of intersections and dead-end paths, it's very easy to get lost. The great mages also knew people would try to invade their tomb to retrieve lost artifacts and have made a number of traps to prevent this.
